titleStmt.title: Carracters [sic] in blood, or, A bleeding saviour held out to a bleeding sinner wherein he may know whether he hath been called by, and followed after the leadings of the spirit : being a draught of the spare-hours of a lover of the faithful / by R.O.
titleStmt.author: Ottee, Robert, d. 1690.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Ottee. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
